name: Cauliflower Fajita Mexican Bowl
description: Oven-roasted fajita vegetables, brown rice, black beans, avocado slices, tomatoes, lettuce, red onions and cashew sour cream.
recipeIngredient: 4-6 cups cooked brown rice, or white rice
1 cup grape tomatoes, sliced if desired

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the Sheet Pan Cauliflower Fajitas.
recipeInstructions.name: Prepare the Sheet Pan Cauliflower Fajitas.

itemListElement.text: Add about 1 cup cooked brown rice to a bowl. Add 1/2 cup black beans, a large serving of the fajita vegetables, some lettuce, avocado slices, tomatoes and red onions. Drizzle with vegan sour cream and hot sauce, if desired. Enjoy!
itemListElement.name: Add about 1 cup cooked brown rice to a bowl. Add 1/2 cup black beans, a large serving of the fajita vegetables, some lettuce, avocado slices, tomatoes and red onions. Drizzle with vegan sour cream and hot sauce, if desired. Enjoy!
